aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text1: Welcome to FreelanceHub, the premier platform connecting skilled freelancers with innovative clients. Our mission is to streamline project collaboration by ensuring high standards of quality, trust, and efficiency. We offer a diverse range of projects, secure payments, and a user-friendly interface to support your professional success.
aboutUs.text2: Join FreelanceHub today and take your freelancing or project management to the next level. Whether you're seeking top talent or exciting opportunities, our platform is designed to meet your needs and help you achieve your goals.

getStart.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStart.text: Join us today and find the perfect project or freelancer for your needs.

card1.title: Total Projects
card1.text: Total number of projects created by the user. This includes all projects that have been initiated by the user, regardless of their current status.

card2.title: Active Projects
card2.text: Number of projects that are currently active and in progress. These projects are actively being worked on by the user or others involved.

card3.title: Completed Projects
card3.text: Number of projects that have been successfully completed. These projects have reached their conclusion and fulfilled their objectives.
